channel.title: Mopar - Do not acuse me of copying code
channel.description:
Look at this picture:
[img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/7081/bloodyhellfs9.jpg[/img]
I have tried to get the Accelerators for these menu items to work. Guess what? They did work, until Sun updated the JDK to 1.6.
Now once the client section has started (the bit with the red progress bar, etc.) the Accelerators are automatically disabled. I wonder how this happened?
Can someone shed any light on this issue?

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:33, topic:59138”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=84697.msg2598275#msg2598275 date=1230089188]

He means on the runescape website…

there is this small ammount of text under each title of a reply, read it form time to time “« Reply #34 on: March 10, 2007, 10:36:53 pm »”
[/quote]

There is this small amount of text under the forum rules, you should read it from time to time.

“Rule 2:
Posts should be knowledgeable, and try to put some effort into them, it’ll save hassle and stop you looking like an idiot.”[/quote]

Too late.

item.title: Mopar - Do not acuse me of copying code
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:29, topic:59138”][quote author=ruler link=topic=84697.msg991442#msg991442 date=1173512924]

Actually ruler, in a court of law, although being copyright by jagex, the code created by any author person would fully suffice under the license given. I.e. You could sue for the code you wrote/created/whatever (this excludes modification).

By that, you mean, subpeona it after looking at a deob? Not gonna happen, since it is against JaGEx’s TOS to deob the client :P. Otherwise, please do explain what you mean.

TOS only applies to accounts.
[/quote]
Not true. If you scroll down to the bottom of the homepage, you’ll see
This website and its contents are copyright © 1999 - 2007 Jagex Ltd.
Use of this website is subject to our Terms+Conditions and Privacy policy[/quote]

I don’t know where you see that at, all the bottom of this page says is that the word ‘Runescape’ is copyright jagex ltd.

Read full topic

By that, you mean, subpeona it after looking at a deob? Not gonna happen, since it is against JaGEx’s TOS to deob the client :P. Otherwise, please do explain what you mean.

TOS only applies to accounts.[/quote]

item.title: Mopar - Do not acuse me of copying code
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:2, topic:59254”][quote author=ada link=topic=84697.msg950498#msg950498 date=1172728006]
Actually, no I didn’t!!!

Goto this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=36625.0

The fact is, That is a bit of a coincedence. If you LOOKED (download it from above) it is very differant to yours!!! Especially the music player. With my music player, it doesn’t loop the same file over and over again :P.
By the way, my installers way better too (based on Windows Installer)
[/quote]
installer? why the fuck do you want java to be installable?[/quote]

Trust me, noobs can’t unzip zip files. I’ve been asked over and over again how to install a zip file!!![br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 08:19:47 AM[/size][hr][quote=“moparisthebest, post:16, topic:59138”]Well, in that case my statement wasn’t wrong, you ‘borrowed’ code, I didn’t accuse you of anything, don’t be so sensitive. ;)[/quote]

You implied that I copied code from you by making the “impression” that I JODEd or JADed your client!!!

Read full topic
